thoughts.text: The URLs of the search results have been saved to a file called martial_arts_urls.txt. I can use the cat command to display the contents of the file and see the URLs.
thoughts.reasoning: I used the curl command to download the HTML source code of the Google search results page, and then used grep to extract the URLs of the search results. The URLs were saved to a file called martial_arts_urls.txt. I can use the cat command to display the contents of the file and see the URLs.
thoughts.plan: - Use the cat command to display the contents of the martial_arts_urls.txt file.
thoughts.speak: The URLs of the search results have been saved to the martial_arts_urls.txt file. I will now use the cat command to display the contents of the file.
